publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3924 Mr Jamie McGrigor: GB Winter Olympics Team—That the Parliament notes that the Winter Olympics are being held in Turin from 10 to 26 February 2006; further notes that, with Rhona Martin, Lynn Cameron, Debbie Knox, Jackie Lockhart, Kelly Wood, David Murdoch, Euan Byers, Ewan MacDonald, Warwick Smith, Craig Wilson, Sinead Kerr, John Kerr, Lesley McKenna, Alain Baxter, Noel Baxter, Roger Cruickshank and Finlay Mickel, Scotland provides 17 of the 40-person British squad, and wishes the Great Britain team every success in increasing their medal haul from four years ago, especially the GB Women’s Curling Team in its efforts to retain its title and to add another gold medal to the one it won so spectacularly in Salt Lake City in 2002. Supported by: Mike Pringle*, David McLetchie*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, John Scott*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Eleanor Scott*, Robin Harper*, Alex Johnstone*, Mr David Davidson*
S2M-3924 GB Winter Olympics Team (lodged on 7 February 2006) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Murdo Fraser*, Margaret Mitchell*, Shiona Baird*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-3924 GB Winter Olympics Team (lodged on 7 February 2006) Chris Ballance*, Iain Smith*, Bill Aitken*, Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3924 Mr Jamie McGrigor: GB Winter Olympics Team—That the Parliament notes that the Winter Olympics are being held in Turin from 10 to 26 February 2006; further notes that, with Rhona Martin, Lynn Cameron, Debbie Knox, Jackie Lockhart, Kelly Wood, David Murdoch, Euan Byers, Ewan MacDonald, Warwick Smith, Craig Wilson, Sinead Kerr, John Kerr, Lesley McKenna, Alain Baxter, Noel Baxter, Roger Cruickshank and Finlay Mickel, Scotland provides 17 of the 40-person British squad, and wishes the Great Britain team every success in increasing their medal haul from four years ago, especially the GB Women’s Curling Team in its efforts to retain its title and to add another gold medal to the one it won so spectacularly in Salt Lake City in 2002. Supported by: Mike Pringle, David McLetchie, Mrs Nanette Milne, Linda Fabiani, Mr Ted Brocklebank, John Scott, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Eleanor Scott, Robin Harper, Alex Johnstone, Mr David Davidson, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Murdo Fraser, Margaret Mitchell, Shiona Baird, Mr Andrew Arbuckle, Maureen Macmillan, Chris Ballance, Iain Smith, Bill Aitken, Donald Gorrie, Miss Annabel Goldie*, Phil Gallie*, Michael McMahon*
S2M-3924 GB Winter Olympics Team (lodged on 7 February 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3924 GB Winter Olympics Team (lodged on 7 February 2006) Murray Tosh*, Susan Deacon*, Mary Scanlon*
